column4: Can someone please direct me toa webpage that shows how to make a ubuntu/kubuntu install look really nice?
like how http://ossnotebook.blogspot.com/2009/03/ubuntu-904-3d-desktop.html is done, I want it like that but he doesn't really say how he just says what he installs and thats it
I'm trying to prove to a friend that ubuntu looks and performs better then windows 7 to a friend
